landing.downloadApp: Download the app and enjoy our services
landing.platformGoal: We strive to provide a reliable and secure platform that enables users to carry out financial transactions easily and flexibly. Our goal is to empower individuals to manage their financial affairs efficiently and transparently.

about.title: About
about.description: Our application is the ultimate solution for managing your financial transactions easily and securely. It allows you to send and receive money quickly and seamlessly, with a simple user interface and a comfortable experience. We strive to provide innovative financial services that ensure transparency and reliability, giving you full control over your money anytime, anywhere.

support.title: Support
support.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to answer your inquiries and resolve any issues you may encounter, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience.

security.title: Security
security.description: Our application is designed with the highest security standards to protect your data and financial transactions, ensuring a reliable and secure experience at every step.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Our application offers high-speed transaction processing, providing you with an instant and seamless experience that meets your needs anytime.

features.title: Features
features.desc: Our application offers a set of features designed to meet your needs professionally Including speed in implementing operations ease of use and the highest levels Security, services and no hidden fees. Our goal is to provide a convenient and transparent financial experience Fits your daily lifestyle.

services.title: services
services.description: We offer a variety of services that meet your daily needs and save you time and effort

convert.title: Ease of switching between users
convert.description: Send and receive money easily and seamlessly between app users.

flash.title: Fast Transactions
flash.description: Execute your financial operations with exceptional speed and without delays.

user.title: Ease of Use
user.description: A simple and intuitive app interface makes conducting transactions hassle-free.

shield.title: Funds Security
shield.description: We ensure complete protection for your funds and transactions using the latest security technologies.

paper.title: No Fees
paper.description: Enjoy our financial services with no hidden fees, keeping all your transactions clear and transparent

faqPage.title: Frequently asked questions
faqPage.description: We give you answers to the most common questions you may have about using the app. Our goal is to provide you with all the information you need for a smooth and comfortable experience. If you have any questions or issues that are not addressed here, feel free to reach out to our support team who are available around the clock to help you.

q1.question: Are there any authorized agents for you in all provinces?
q1.answer: The authorized agents have not been determined yet.

q2.question: What is the activation process for the app?
q2.answer: Please watch the video dedicated to how to create an account.

q3.question: Can you tell me about the purpose of the ShamCash app?
q3.answer: ShamCash is an app dedicated to electronic payments and money transfers, offering a wide range of diverse services.

q4.question: Where can I find my account number?
q4.answer: The account number is located under your name and is made up of 16 digits.

q5.question: Is the app intended for transferring salaries to it instead of receiving them as cash?
q5.answer: Yes, this is one of the app's goals.

q6.question: How can I update the Sham Cash app?
q6.answer: You can update the app from the official Sham Cash website or through its official channels on Telegram and WhatsApp.

q7.question: Is there a Sham Cash app for computers or a link to open it in a browser?
q7.answer: This service is not available at the moment.

q8.question: What is the purpose of the Sham Cash app?
q8.answer: The main purpose of Sham Cash is to facilitate financial transactions, reduce the burden of damaged currency, and provide the essential services we need.

q9.question: Is there a channel on Telegram or a page on Facebook I can follow for the latest news?
q9.answer: We have a channel on Telegram and a page on Facebook to follow the latest news and updates: Telegram channel: https://t.me/ShamCash2 Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/sham.cash1

q10.question: What is a Sham Cash account?
q10.answer: Sham Cash account is an electronic bank account used to execute financial transactions through the app. Currently, there is no integration with other electronic payment applications, but any future updates will be announced.

q11.question: What is meant by the account name?
q11.answer: The account name is the name that appears to the public in the Sham Cash application. It is preferable to choose a three-part name to avoid similarity with other names.

q12.question: Is there a problem if I click on verify later without entering the confirmation code?
q12.answer: No problem if you press verify later. The code will be requested in the next update.

q13.question: Can I use a non-Arabic name for a Sham Cash account?
q13.answer: You can use any name that hasn't been used before, but it's better to write your full name to avoid name similarities.

q14.question: How can I benefit from the code I saved when creating the account?
q14.answer: The code you saved is used to recover your account or reset your password in case you lose it.

q15.question: How can I become an agent for Sham Cash in the Safira area of rural Aleppo?
q15.answer: There is no possibility to appoint agents. You can leave a clarification about your work, address, in addition to your name and contact number, in case agents or authorized representatives become available in the future, so you can be informed of the conditions.

q16.question: Can I change the email associated with my account?
q16.answer: The email associated with your account cannot be changed.

q17.question: I use the Cham Cash account normally. Should I open a Cham Bank account in Idlib or is it unnecessary?
q17.answer: The Sham Cash app is dedicated to electronic financial transactions and is not linked to Sham Bank. Therefore, it is not necessary to open an account at Sham Bank to use Sham Cash.

q1.question: How can I withdraw my money from ShamCash?
q1.answer: You can top up your ShamCash balance through the authorized exchange offices in the app or through approved banks.

q2.question: How can I load my ShamCash balance?
q2.answer: You can top up your ShamCash balance from the authorized centers within the app or through banks.

q3.question: Are there any fees charged during the transfer process?
q3.answer: No fees are charged during the transfer process.

q4.question: Is receiving monthly payments only possible through the app, or can the bank card also be used?
q4.answer: It depends on how the payments are transferred to you. If the transfer is made to your bank account, you can use the bank card. If the transfer is made through Sham Cash, you can use Sham Cash. The Sham Cash electronic account is separate from the bank account.

q5.question: How can I withdraw money from the app?
q5.answer: You can withdraw money through one of the bank branches or from the nearest authorized agent. You can find a list of authorized offices within the app.

q6.question: How can I transfer money to another Sham Cash account?
q6.answer: You can transfer using the QR code of the other account or by the account address provided by the recipient.

q7.question: How can I transfer money from my bank account to my Sham Cash account?
q7.answer: You cannot transfer directly. You can withdraw money from your bank account and then load your Sham Cash account.

q8.question: Can I transfer money from my Binance wallet to my Sham Cash account?
q8.answer: This service is not available at the moment.

q9.question: How can I recharge my Sham Cash account?
q9.answer: You can recharge your Sham Cash account through accredited centers. You can find a list of accredited offices within the app.

q10.question: How can I withdraw or load money to and from my Sham Cash account?
q10.answer: Withdrawal and loading of money can only be done at accredited centers. A list of accredited centers is available within the app.

q11.question: How can I transfer an amount to donate to non-liberated areas?
q11.answer: Through remittance offices in donation boxes.

q12.question: How can I transfer an amount to someone's account if the QR code doesn't work?
q12.answer: To be able to transfer the amount to someone's account, make sure to grant the app permission to access the camera.

q13.question: If I transfer a sum of money to a person's account in Damascus, how can they withdraw the amount? And can I transfer to Al-Haram Company, for example? Do the centers listed in the app accept cash withdrawals?
q13.answer: There is currently no external integration between ShamCash and any electronic payment application, and API integration has not been made available. If this happens in the future, it will be announced through our official channels. Stay tuned for the latest news: • Sham Cash support channel: https://t.me/ShamCash2 • Our Facebook page.

q14.question: Can we deposit money in Cham banks inside Idlib?
q14.answer: To deposit or withdraw money from your Sham Cash account, you can go to the bank or the authorized exchange offices.

category3.name: Questions about Account Security and Money Protection

q1.question: In case my phone is lost, can I recover my money before accessing the account from another phone? What security measures are in place to prevent someone else from withdrawing my money from the balance?
q1.answer: The account is linked to your Gmail account. You can open the account from another phone and recover the balance. You can also set a transfer code, which ensures protection from transfers and withdrawals by someone else.

q2.question: Are transfer operations encrypted?
q2.answer: Yes, transfer operations are fully encrypted and do not appear to any third party.

q3.question: How can I keep my money in the app safe from theft?
q3.answer: You can keep your money in the app by using only your email and password to access your account. Make sure to use a strong and unguessable password.

q4.question: How can I ensure the security of my account if I lose the phone that contains the Sham Cash account?
q4.answer: To secure your account after losing the device, you can log in from your new phone, where you will be automatically logged out from the old device. It is also advisable to change your password to ensure complete protection for your account.

category4.name: Questions about Additional Services and Features

q1.question: What services does the ShamCash app provide? Does it work in all provinces of Syria?
q1.answer: The app is available across Syria and offers a variety of services, including electronic payments, money transfers, and other services like paying electricity bills and higher education fees.

q2.question: Can I receive money from the UAE through the app?

q3.question: Can I use the Syrian currency (SYP) in the app?
q3.answer: Currently, only US dollars are supported.

q4.question: Can I receive money from abroad via ShamCash in Damascus?
q4.answer: There is currently no method to receive money from outside the country via the app.

q5.question: Can I trade currencies through the Sham Cash app?
q5.answer: This service is not available at the moment.

q6.question: Can I use my Sham Bank account through the app?
q6.answer: No, your Sham Cash account is separate from your bank account.

q7.question: Are there any fees for transactions in Sham Cash?
q7.answer: Sham Cash services are free, and no fees are charged.

q8.question: How can I search for an account using the account number?
q8.answer: You cannot search using the account number. The other person must send you their QR code.

q9.question: Are there any fees for recharging the electricity meter?
q9.answer: There are no fees for recharging the electricity meter.

q10.question: Can I recharge my Syria Phone balance through the app?
q10.answer: Various services, including this one, will be available soon in the app.

q11.question: How many electricity meters can I recharge through the Sham Cash app?
q11.answer: You can register two meters on each Sham Cash account.

q12.question: How can I benefit from Sham Cash services for international remittances?
q12.answer: International remittance services are currently not available within the Sham Cash app.

q13.question: Can I link my Sham Cash account to my Sham Bank account?
q13.answer: You cannot link your Sham Cash account to your Sham Bank account at this time.

q14.question: How long do I need to wait to change the electricity meter?
q14.answer: You can modify the electricity meter after 30 days.

q15.question: How can I print my transaction history (transfers to and from my account)?
q15.answer: You can print any transaction from the transaction history by long-pressing the transaction you wish to print.

q16.question: How can I set a profile picture in the app?
q16.answer: This feature has not been activated yet.

q17.question: Adding the feature to pay for app subscriptions like YouTube Premium through Sham Cash will significantly contribute to the development of the app and expand its range of services. We hope this feature will be activated in the future to provide more convenience for users.
q17.answer: Currently, there is no connection between the Sham Cash app and any other electronic payment applications. Any future changes will be announced through our official channels: Telegram channel: https://t.me/ShamCash2 Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/sham.cash1

q18.question: Can I link my bank account to my Cham Cash account?
q18.answer: There is no connection between bank accounts and Cham Cash accounts.

q19.question: How can I link my Cham Cash account to my email?
q19.answer: If you choose to confirm later, you can log in without any issues for now. You will be prompted to enter the code later.

category5.name: Questions about Technical Issues and Technical Support

q1.question: The verification code has not been sent.
q1.answer: Please enter the email you used to register so that the message can be sent to you.

q2.question: Where can I find the security code?
q2.answer: This interface is dedicated to changing the password, and a verification code is sent when the account is created for the first time. If you have access to the account, you can generate a new security code.

q3.question: I forgot my email address.
q3.answer: Please contact customer service and provide them with some information about your account to recover it.

q4.question: I cannot change my account password, and I am unable to log in. I need to change the password.
q4.answer: Please contact customer service and provide them with the email address associated with your account.

q5.question: I am trying to activate the app, but I haven’t received the verification code to my email.
q5.answer: Please contact customer service and provide them with the email address associated with your account.

q6.question: I am using the app to receive my salary, but I get an error message in the account.
q6.answer: You need to be registered with an account on the app first.

q7.question: What should I do if the app is not working and a black screen appears?
q7.answer: Clear the app data and then log in again.

q8.question: How can I recover my Sham Cash account after resetting my mobile phone?
q8.answer: You can recover your account by logging in using your username and password from any device.

q9.question: I didn't receive the verification code on my email when trying to activate my Sham Cash account. What should I do?
q9.answer: Open your Gmail app and check the 'Spam' folder for the verification code.

q10.question: What is the solution if I get a message saying the app is not installed while downloading the app?
q10.answer: Try freeing up space on your phone and try downloading the app again.

q11.question: When I try to change the account name, it shows me that the name is unavailable. What is the solution?
q11.answer: You can change the name to one that hasn't been used before. It is preferable to write the full name to avoid name similarities.

q12.question: What should I do if a white screen appears when I open the app?
q12.answer: You can solve this problem by clearing the app data and reopening the app by going to Settings - Apps - Sham Cash - Data and Storage - Clear Data.

q13.question: Why can't I access some names when searching in the app?
q13.answer: The search box only works with verified accounts, and unverified accounts cannot be found.

category6.name: Questions about account creation and login

q1.question: I am trying to create a new account, but it is not accepting it.
q1.answer: Please enter your birth date in the correct format: year-month-day. Make sure the month and day are two digits.

q2.question: I am facing difficulty in creating a ShamCash account; it shows a message saying the email or password is incorrect.
q2.answer: You need to create an account first before logging in.

q3.question: I am trying to create an account, but I am encountering an issue with entering my birth date.
q3.answer: Please enter your birth date in the correct format: year-month-day. Make sure the month and day are two digits.

q4.question: What does the account name consist of?
q4.answer: The account name should consist of your name, and it is preferred that it matches the name on your ID card.

q5.question: I am trying to log in, but it shows that my password is incorrect.
q5.answer: Please contact customer service and provide them with the email address associated with your account.

q6.question: Can I change the account number?
q6.answer: The account number is encrypted and cannot be accessed by anyone, as only the last four digits are displayed. If you insist on changing it, you must change the entire account.

q7.question: How can I delete the account?
q7.answer: The account cannot be deleted directly, but you can contact us if you have any other inquiries regarding the account.

q8.question: Can I create two accounts on the same device and the same application, especially if the other device does not support installing the application due to an old version?
q8.answer: The app does not support multiple accounts on the same device. You can log out of one account and log into another, or you can clone the app and use it on the same device.

q9.question: How do I write the email?
q9.answer: You can use any of the accounts you have available, such as (Hotmail, Yahoo, Gmail), and write the email correctly when registering.

q10.question: How can I change the account type from government to personal?
q10.answer: You can change the account type by accessing the account information and making the necessary adjustments.

q11.question: Why does the app ask for a password when changing the account name?
q11.answer: The password is required to ensure the security of your account.

footer.title: Contact us
footer.description: If you have any questions, comments, or encounter any problems, please feel free to contact us. Our support team is always here to provide assistance and ensure a smooth user experience.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.desc: Welcome to Sham Cash service, we are proud to offer you the electronic payment service, by using this program, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions :

cnonditions.cnonditions1: You are fully responsible for the accuracy of your account data and for protecting login data.
cnonditions.cnonditions2: We disclaim any responsibility for any errors resulting from your misuse of the program.
cnonditions.cnonditions3: You are responsible for all operations and transfers that take place in your account.
cnonditions.cnonditions4: Your inappropriate and unethical use of the program and your attempt to circumvent the program makes you fully responsible and exposes you to the issue.
cnonditions.cnonditions5: We are not responsible for any fraudulent operations that you are exposed to as a result of your use of counterfeit copies or other methods.
cnonditions.cnonditions6: You are not entitled to use the program for illegal purposes or in violation of the systems and laws in force.
cnonditions.cnonditions7: We have the right to suspend your account if you violate the agreement or by judicial order without referring to you.
cnonditions.cnonditions8: All legal issues are resolved through the courts affiliated with the local authority.
cnonditions.cnonditions9: We reserve the right to change or modify this agreement at any time, without the need to notify you, but to announce it in the manner we deem appropriate and your continued use of the program after making any changes or modifications to this agreement constitutes your acceptance of these changes or modifications.

terms.desc2: This agreement explains the terms and conditions related to how you use our program, and it is legally binding between Sham Bank and the user. Please read this agreement carefully before using the program.
terms.desc3: We strive to provide a secure and reliable platform that allows users to send and receive cash transfers easily and conveniently. Our goal is to give users the ability to manage their money professionally and transparently.
terms.thank: Thank you for your trust in Sham Cash, and we look forward to providing you with exceptional financial service.
terms.allert: Your use of the program constitutes your acceptance of these terms and conditions, and if you do not agree to any part of this agreement, you must stop using the program immediately.

fAnswerQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
fAnswerQuestions.desc: We provide you with answers to the most common questions you may have about using the app. Our goal is to equip you with all the information you need for a smooth and comfortable experience.

q1.question: How much is the transfer fee?
q1.answer: The service is free, and there is currently no transfer fee.

q2.question: What guarantees does the platform have to ensure it doesn't shut down suddenly? Is there a guarantor like Sham Bank, for example?

q3.question: Is there anyone protecting the platform from hacking? And what is the likelihood of it being hacked?
q3.answer: Yes, there is a team of programmers dedicated to protecting the platform.

q4.question: Can Sham Cash be used to top up credit in SyriaPhone or recharge electricity?
q4.answer: Soon, several services will be activated, including mobile credit, electricity, and e-commerce.

verification.title: Account verification
verification.desc: The account verification interface allows you to quickly and securely confirm your identity to use all the features of the e-wallet. You will need to enter some basic information, such as your full name and ID number, and then upload the required documents, such as your ID card or passport.

errors.accountNumberLength: Account number must be at least 16 digits long
errors.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number must start with 09 and be exactly 10 digits long
errors.phoneNumberLength: Phone number must contain exactly 10 digits
errors.taxNumberDigitsOnly: financial  number must contain only digits (0-9)

messages.requestAlreadySent: The request has already been sent.
messages.accountNotFound: Account not found. Please check the entered data and make sure it is correct.
messages.serverConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to the server. Please try again later.
messages.requestSentSuccessfully: The request has been sent successfully.

otpAlert.title: Confirmation Code
otpAlert.otpmessage: Enter the verification code sent to your phone number to complete the process.
otpAlert.error: Invalid OTP code, you can request
otpAlert.rerequest: If you didn’t receive the code, you can request
